entry.name: jQuery.boxModel
entry.title: jQuery.boxModel
entry.desc: States if the current page, in the user's browser, is being rendered using the W3C CSS Box Model.

div.p: Note: This API has been removed in jQuery 3.0; check if .document.compatMode is equal to "CSS1Compat" instead. Or, even better - always specify a DOCTYPE and avoid using quirks mode which jQuery doesn't support.
